testcase.name: Verify_If_User_Is_Able_To_Play_Searched_Video
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @browse_video scenario: Verify if user is able to play searched video given user navigates to "https://m.twitch.tv" ... Status.passed in 4.069s given user clicks search icon ... Status.passed in 0.1109s given user searches for "StarCraft II" in search bar ... Status.passed in 0.108s given clicks "Channels" tab from search results ... Status.passed in 0.0944s given user scrolls the page "2" times ... Status.passed in 2.031s given user selects a random streamer ... Status.passed in 5.567s then video is played on selected streamer ... Status.passed in 0.02251s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
